name: King Cobra Professional Wand Maker
description:
This is the Windows package for Alpha 3! This game is being developed in the Godot game engine.

A special thanks to the kingcobrajfs subreddit for all the encouragement. If you aren't already subscribed, come join the fun! And don't forget to subscribe to the muse behind it all, youtube celebrity and worldwide sensation King Cobra

Controls:

  • WASD and Mouse to move
  • E to grab and activate objects
  • ESC to open the main menu (Invert mouse, toggle music etc)
